[Desc]               <blue>You are Richard. You're a 19 year old guy, with dark eyes, thick black curly hair and a striking resemblance to Maurice Moss. A year ago you got your highschool diploma and though you've been living on-campus at the Knox College in Chelsea, you have to admit you're yet to attend a single lecture. Although you used to be an ace student, the past year hans't been too kind to you, and your enthusiasim for life and learning has leaked away. At nearly six feet, you're no giant, but not quite a midget either, though your slim build, black cotton top, and baggy cargo pants make you seem shorter than you really are. You're skin is a mellow golden colour, though you try to hide of much of it as possible. You're not really sure why you decided to sign up for this show, but if you're totally honest with yourself, the idea of becoming a 'new person' is extremely attractive. </blue>;

[status]               You are wearing a a black cotton shirt. Or perhaps "top" would be the better term. It completley covers your $ARMS$ and you often find yourself tugging the sleeves over your fingers because....well...you like them that way. With a loose collar, equipped with only three buttons, and a generous hem, it's not nearly formal attire, but it's probably more 'uptight' than what most people would muck about in.;
[short]               long-sleeved black cotton shirt;
[tgShade]            shirt 0;
[STAGE] 1;
[tf]               You feel something brush against your $ARMS$ and glancing down you watch with growing concern as the nice long sleeves of your black top, break away and fall to the floor, leaving clean seams somewhere around your elbow, as if the garment had been designed that way. Bending down you gather up the two tubes of fabric and try to slip them back on, but they fall to peices in your $HANDS$ and grumbling you fold your arms against your $BREASTS$ and frown moodily around at everyone. ;
[status]               A black regular black t-shirt is covering your $BREASTS$, it's sleeves a bit longer than your regular tee, though they still expose a good bit of your $ARMS$. It has a single button near the simple collar, though it's not exactly clear what purpose it serves. Who on earth wants to button up a t-shirt? You tug gently a the hem, which is resting only slightly below your $WAIST$, it's not quite as long as it used to be it seems. ;
[short]               black short-sleeved cotton shirt
;
[tgShade]            shirt 20;
[STAGE] 2;
[tf]               Eyeing your opponent, you jump slightly at the sudden sensation of your t-shirt brushing against your $BODY$. Glancing down you frown as you watch the black material recede even further up your arms, coming to rest just below your armpits. Nothing else seems to happen, so you give a little huff of annoyance, rub your increasingly exposed $ARMS$ and turn your attention back to game. Which is probably why you fail to notice the little white ASICS logo which fades into being in the centre of your chest.;
[status]               You a wearing a standard black t-shirt, though on closer inspection, it does look like it might be the ladies cut rather than the mens. Definatley nothing 'standard' about that as far as you're concerened. With a plain loose collar and nothing so much as a witty logo to break up the uniform black colour, it's almost downright boring. But when you squint down at your $BREASTS$ you notice small white lettering in the middle of your chest, and pulling the fabric away from your $BODY$ you manage to make out the letters A-S-I-C-S. Fantastic. A branded sports t-shirt. -_-;
[short]               black t-shirt;
[tgShade]            shirt 40;
[STAGE] 3;
[tf]               You yawn and stretch your $ARMS$, this show really is starting to get a litlle dull you think. What really needs to happen is....but that thought flies from your head as you feel air flowing freely across your $SHOULDERS$ and down your neck. Your $FACE$ goes wide with astonishment and looking down you watch as the collar of your t-shirt continues to drop away from your, showing off more and more of your $BREASTS$. Just as you reach to tug it back up, you feel a tickling in the crook of your arms, and utterly pissed off, you placate yourself with the knowledge you'll only have to wear this silly thing until the end of the show. ;
[status]               Your top can no longer be called a shirt. It now resides in the catagory of clothing reserved exclusively for girls, hipster guys, and idiots who spend their days pumping lead at the gym. Now little more than a black tank-top, without a sleeve in sight, and a low neckline that exposes more of your $BREASTS$ than you would ever have like to, it's still a uniform plain black, though the little white Asics logo is now located just under the left strap. ;
[short]               black tank-top;
[tgShade]            shirt 60;
[STAGE] 4;
[tf]               With a strange pinching feeling, the straps of your tank top, cross themselves behind you, but just as you go to feel around your shoulder-blades and try and get some idea of what's going on back there, the hem of your top tightens around your $WAIST$ and with alarming speed, shrinks upwards, revealing your belly to the audience. Crossing your $ARMS$ over it to try and get rid of the horrible exposed feeling, you watch in horror and an odd sort of fascination as the low neck flexes, and forms into a tight little V-neck. Relaxing for a minute you jump slightly at the feeling of something wriggling across your $BREASTS$ and looking down you watch as elastic seams grow out across your chest and under your armpits, forming two rounded shapes that you realise with a start, are designed to cradle breasts. ;
[status]               It's official. You're wearing a bra. You can't exactly say that it's a bad thing..at least it seems to be more of a sports bra than a frilly lacy brassiere for the weaker sex. But still. You are a guy, bra's arn't exactly meant to be for you. Still. At least you got a functional one. Heck, it even reminds you of women like Ripley from Aliens and Revy of Black Lagoon fame. You smile, looking like one of those badass ladies is actually quite an enticing prospect. Even the little white ASICS logo on the left....er....cup? Is neat. ;
[short]               black sports bra;
[tgShade]            shirt 80;
[STAGE] 5;
[tf]               With a sudden, almost frenzied motion, you try and unclip your sports bra and shrug it off. But of course, it dosn't have a regular hook-and-eye. Your $HANDS$ scrabbling at the elastic straps, you tug the thing off and pant slightly as your $BREASTS$ are layed bare for everyone to see. Fuck it. Who cares, you feel so much better now. ;
[status]               You've discarded your sports bra in favour of revealing your $BREASTS$ to the world. You're strangley not concered about being naked in front of a bunch of people, in fact you barley even recognise that they're there, Your body just feels too fantastic! It finally feels like your own, not some sort of shabby substitute. ;
[short]               fully naked! ;
